short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transcribe, Summarize, & Bookmark Moments in YouTube Videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get transcripts, summaries, and bookmark moments in YouTube videos. 

Free Chrome Extension that lets you quickly access transcripts of YouTube videos, summarize YouTube videos, and bookmark your favorite moments.

HOW IT WORKS:
- Visit a YouTube video.
- Open the chrome extension and click “Summarize Video”.
- Get a summary of the video, along with the transcript, and chapter highlights.
- Bookmark any moment to your library for future reference.

## What are the benefits? ## 

1. Stop rewatching the same video.  Search for exactly what you need and jump straight to that point.
2. Bookmark key points, make notes, and absorb the information in your own way.
3. Combine visual and textual-based learning.

## How do I use this? ## 

1. Install the browser extension.
2. Pin chrome extension to your toolbar.
3. Open a YouTube video you'd like to summarize.
4. Click on the chrome extension to open it.
5. Click “Summarize Video” and generate a summary, transcript, and the ability to bookmark the YouTube video.

The summary will be written like a blog article so you can understand the video in 5 minutes.

Use transcript timestamps to jump to specific parts of the video.

Bookmark your favorite moments for later.
